HeroSection.subHeader: Reliable, professional service for your transport needs and logistics projects <important>from planning to completion.</important>

AboutSection.header: Enka - your trusted partner for logistics at any scale
AboutSection.textContent: Enka provides global transport services to companies all over the world. Our team of experienced professionals will deliver your cargo to your location at the exact time you specify. Our headquarters are based in Poland, from where we cooperate with our global network of partners. We have carried out dozens of projects, including complex oversize transports. Whether by land, sea or inland waterway, we offer solutions for every budget and every industry. We ensure smooth deliveries and the highest level of cargo security.

GlobalCoverage.text: We operate in Poland and all over the world. We have branches in Poland (Gdańsk and Milanówek) and Milan, Italy

ProjectCargo.text: Planning a complex logistics project? Take advantage of transport by sea, overland or by barge.

OnTime.text: Direct contact with an experienced freight forwarder guarantees order fulfilment under all circumstances.

ServicesSection.textContent: We carefully tailor each of our services to the customer's needs and the type of the cargo - with us, your shipment is in the right hands.

ProjectCargo.title: Project cargo
ProjectCargo.subtitle: Complex logistics projects at any scale

ExperienceSection.textContent: We have particular experience in services across Europe, the Middle East, and Central and East Asia. Find out more about our most commonly served regions:
ExperienceSection.mapImageAlt: World map with highlighted regions most commonly served by Enka
ExperienceSection.dislaimerText:
Interested in another direction?

Contact us - Enka operates worldwide.

1.content: ENKA has greatly improved the way I do business. I didn't have to worry about the logistics of transporting my goods across the country. Everything ran smoothly, which was a huge relief for me!
1.author: Piotr Pogorzelski
1.title: CEO of The Company

ServicesPage.title: Our Services
ServicesPage.subtitle: Discover Enka's reliable logistics solutions, from Project Cargo handling to inland transport, dedicated to businesses worldwide.

ProjectCargo.title: Project Cargo
ProjectCargo.textContent: Project Cargo transport is a specialized service designed for companies executing complex projects requiring the transport of oversized, unique, or high-value cargo. Enka provides comprehensive transport solutions tailored to the individual needs of the client. With years of experience and a global network of partners, we ensure timeliness and safety, regardless of the scale and location of the project.

1.title: Comprehensive Service
1.textContent: From route planning to delivery execution, all under the supervision of an experienced expert.

2.title: Specialized Equipment
2.textContent: Access to advanced transport equipment and technologies for the transport of specialized cargo.

3.title: Global Reach
3.textContent: We execute projects in Poland and worldwide, supporting clients in their international ventures.

4.title: Who is it for?
4.textContent: A service particularly dedicated to companies in the construction, energy, and industrial sectors.

InlandTransport.title: Inland Transport (River)
InlandTransport.textContent: Enka offers inland transport using river barges, which are an economical and environmentally friendly alternative to traditional transport methods. This service is dedicated to transporting large quantities of bulk cargo, such as raw materials or industrial products, on waterways in Poland and Europe.

1.title: Environment and Savings
1.textContent: River transport reduces emissions and lowers logistics costs.

2.title: Capacity and Efficiency
2.textContent: An ideal solution for large volumes of goods and oversized cargo.

3.title: Safety
3.textContent: Professional service and continuous monitoring of cargo routes.

4.title: Who is it for?
4.textContent: A service especially dedicated to companies in the raw materials, construction, and chemical industries using inland routes.

MaritimeTransport.title: Maritime Transport
MaritimeTransport.textContent: Maritime transport is the ideal solution for companies looking for an economical way to transport cargo over long distances. Through cooperation with global shipping lines, Enka offers access to the most efficient routes and ports worldwide. The service includes a full range of activities: from loading to customs clearance.

1.title: Cost-Effectiveness
1.textContent: The best price-to-capacity ratio for long-distance transport.

2.title: Global Network
2.textContent: Access to key seaports around the world.

3.title: Customs Support
3.textContent: Comprehensive handling of customs clearance and documentation.

4.title: Who is it for?
4.textContent: Companies engaged in international trade or requiring global logistics.

LandTransport.title: Land Transport
LandTransport.textContent: Land transport is a fast and flexible way to move cargo across Poland, Europe, and Asia. Enka operates with an experienced team of drivers, ensuring efficient delivery under any conditions. Regardless of the type of cargo, we offer a personalized approach to each order.

1.title: Speed and Flexibility
1.textContent: Transport tailored to the client's individual schedules.

2.title: Secure Deliveries
2.textContent: Full cargo protection at every stage of transport.

3.title: Diverse Services
3.textContent: Handling of standard, oversized, and ADR cargo.

4.title: Who is it for?
4.textContent: Companies requiring fast transport of goods over short and medium distances.

RealizationsPage.title: Realizations
RealizationsPage.subtitle: Take a look at the gallery of our realisations, in which we present examples of successful transports carried out by Enka. Each photo is proof of our commitment to delivering your goods on time, regardless of size, route or industry.
